nodes.text: Star Wars: Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith: The Dying Light

Star Wars: Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith: The Dying Light is the second story arc of Marvel Comics' series Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith. Written by Charles Soule with art by Giuseppe Camuncoli, the arc comprises four issues, and was in publication from November 1, 2017 to January 10, 2018.
